ResourceHeader.Description: Kapuskasing (KAPU) station is located in Kapuskasing, ON, Canada. KAPU is part of the UCLA GBO Network. Magnetic Latitude: 60.9 Magnetic Longitude: 350.60 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 5.4833 Magnetic Declination: -10.12 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the GMAG data
